True Limit Order, not Market Order
If your order is filled, the asset move out from your wallet to opponents’ wallet.
Unlike AMM-triggered pseudo limits, HOOATS executes true limit orders directly at quoted prices, avoiding spread leakage and improving price integrity.

HyperIndex Vault auto-executes arbitrage across all L1/L2 pools, similar to Hyperliquid’s Protocol Vault.
Users can deposit into the Vault and earn yield by tracking protocol-level arbitrage returns.
Direct arbitrage is limited to institutional players (e.g., Market Makers).
Users access via Protocol Vaults, not APIs — keeping it as an institutional-grade tool while opening yield opportunities.
Engineered for scale, HOOATS targets 20K+ transactions per second with ~3 ms execution latency, delivering a snappy trading UX unmatched by legacy DEXs.
HISR always prioritize the Orderbook matches, to minimize mandatory AMM slippages. In case, we can get rid of slippages that orderbook covering amount.
Minimize Orderbook Blank Spreads via AMM
Orderbook inevitably has a price blanks, which is called spreads.
In HOOATS, AMM fills the gap between orderbbok prices, so no blank spreads will occur.
CopyTrading has rapidly grown as a core trend in crypto markets since 2024, allowing users to follow and replicate expert strategies with one click.
